intro: Agathosma reflexa, commonly known as the Cape daisy, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its daisy-like yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in sandy or rocky soils and thrives in full sun. It has a compact, bushy growth habit with small, lance-shaped leaves. Agathosma reflexa is often used in ornamental gardening due to its attractive appearance and hardy nature.
